name: HAZESHOCK
description:
"Don't let them come near you. Shoot to kill. And punch maybe."

The player has to kill as many enemies as possible without dying. You can use a rifle and a pistol, and even punch while holding the pistol. You can heal yourself when your low on health with the floating health boxes. Don't worry, they'll keep coming back, at the same spot. 
The enemies come in waves so be prepared for a swarm of these annoying little robots, IT MIGHT GET NASTY.  Also, be ready with your 360 vision, they can sneak up on you from behind! 

Note: This is the first open beta version of the game so you might experience some bugs or crashes, which'll get fixed in some time. I'll also be constantly adding new features and updates so any feedback from you is appreciated!
